name: Snowtown Showdown (alx)
description:
Snowtown Showdown is a winter-themed shooter where you gather snowballs by absorbing your enemies attacks, then counter with a flurry of snowballs of your own. Balance offense and defense to take down as many vile non-hatted snowmen as possible!

Made in 3 days for ScoreSpace Jam #20. Theme: "Absorb"

Controls:

  • Movement: W/A/S/D
  • Throw a snowball: Left mouse click
  • Absorb attacks: Spacebar

UI explanation:

  • Bottom right: Absorb shield icon
  • Top right: current score (kills)
  • Bottom left: stats-Top current snowballs, Bottom current health

Using your absorb ability makes a bright shield icon appear in the bottom right. Once absorb runs out, the shield will darken, and cooldown will start. When absorb is available again, the shield will disappear.

In the main menu, at the top left of the scoreboard, there is a refresh button that refreshes the leaderboard.
